BudgIT bụ òtù obodo Naijiria nke na-etinye teknụzụ maka itinye aka ụmụ amaala na mmelite ụlọ ọrụ iji mee ka mgbanwe ọha na eze dị mfe
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, nke malitere ọrụ na Lagos, Naịjirịa, bụ nke Oluseun Onigbinde na Joseph Agunbiade guzobere n'afọ 2011 iji nye nkwado ọha na eze site na iji teknụzụ.
Oluseun Onigbinde na Joseph Agunbiade guzobere BudgIT n'afọ 2011 dị ka otu n'oge hackathon e mere na Co-Creation Hub

Na Co-Creation Hub ha chepụtara echiche maka ịnweta data mepere emepe nke mmefu gọọmentị maka ihe ọmụma ọha na eze, na-eduga na mmalite BudgIT. N'afọ 2014, Omidyar Network tinyere dollar narị puku anọ na BudgIT. Na Jụn 2015, gọọmentị Kaduna Steeti n'okpuru nchịkwa nke Mallam El-Rufai, bịanyere aka na BudgIT iji wuo ọnụ ụzọ mkpanaka Open Budget yiri Buharimeter; ikpo okwu nke BudgIT maka Center for Democracy and Development wuru iji mee ka Onye isi ala Buhari nwee ajụjụ maka nkwa mkpọsa ya. Na Jenụwarị 2017, BudgIT nwetara onyinye nde dollar atọ ọzọ site na Omidyar Network na Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

N'afọ 2014, e mepụtara Tracka iji soro mmejuputa ọrụ gọọmentị na obodo dị iche iche iji hụ na nnyefe ọrụ. Na-arụ ọrụ na steeti iri abụo na Naịjirịa, ọ na-enye ndị Naịjirị ohere itinye foto nke ọrụ mmepe na obodo ha iji soro ndị nnọchi anya ha họpụtara kwurịta okwu, ma chọọ ka a rụchaa ọrụ gọọmentị na mpaghara ha.
